FNX.PilotsDeck.json.Author: Fragtality
FNX.PilotsDeck.json.Name: Fenix - PilotsDeck only
FNX.PilotsDeck.json.Description: Profile enabling only PilotsDeck Support (to be used together with Fenix2GSX)

FBW.A320-Profile.json.Author: Fragtality
FBW.A320-Profile.json.Name: FlyByWire A320
FBW.A320-Profile.json.Description:
Profile for Automation and Volume-Control on the FBW A320.
Import the Flightplan in the MCDU to trigger Departure Services.
Don't forget to power on the EFB first!
The SmartButton is mapped to the MECH Call Button on the Overhead.

FNX.Native.json.Author: Fragtality
FNX.Native.json.Name: Fenix - Native
FNX.Native.json.Description: Profile enhancing Fenix' native GSX Integration with Automation and Volume Control

FBW.A380-Profile.json.Author: Fragtality
FBW.A380-Profile.json.Name: FlyByWire A380
FBW.A380-Profile.json.Description:
Profile for Automation and Volume-Control on the FBW A380.
Import the Flightplan in the MCDU to trigger Departure Services.
Don't forget to power on the EFB first!
The SmartButton is mapped to the INT/RAD Switch on the ACP (Captain).
